headline: The Special Counsel Filed Revised Charges Against Trump
description: Federal prosecutors issued a new indictment accusing Donald Trump of plotting to overturn the 2020 election, revising charges to align with a Supreme Court ruling on presidential immunity.
newsletter_headline: The Special Counsel Filed Revised Charges Against Trump
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Israeli forces rescued a hostage from Gaza. Here’s the latest from the end of Tuesday.

headline: Trump asked R.F.K. Jr. to join his transition team
description: Donald Trump plans to name Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and Tulsi Gabbard as honorary co-chairs of his presidential transition team, helping to select policies and personnel for a potential second administration.

headline: Israeli forces rescued a hostage from Gaza
description: Israel’s military announced the rescue of an Israeli citizen abducted during the Hamas-led attacks on Oct. 7, found by soldiers in a Hamas tunnel network in southern Gaza.

headline: A rare mosquito-borne virus has the Northeast on alert
